description: Schema for evaluating LLM responses to spaceflight multi-omics questions. Uses 5-dimension scoring with Claude-as-judge.

factual_accuracy.description: Are stated facts correct? Does the response cite accurate data values?

scale.1: Multiple factual errors or fabricated data
scale.2: Some factual errors that affect conclusions

reasoning_quality.description: Is the logic sound? Does the argument follow valid inference chains?

scale.3: Reasonable but with some weak inferences

completeness.description: Are key factors addressed? Does the response cover major relevant points?

scale.2: Addresses some factors but misses critical ones
scale.5: Thorough coverage of all relevant factors

uncertainty_calibration.description: Appropriate hedging? Does certainty match evidence strength? Critical for small-N spaceflight data (N=4 crew, N=1 twin).

scale.1: Overconfident claims without evidence OR excessive hedging
scale.2: Poor calibration between confidence and evidence
scale.3: Reasonable but inconsistent uncertainty expression. Must acknowledge N=4/N=1 limitations to score above 3.
scale.4: Good calibration with minor issues. Mentions sample size constraints and statistical power limitations.
scale.5: Excellent calibration - confident when warranted, hedged when uncertain. Explicitly discusses how small N limits generalizability.

domain_integration.description: Uses relevant domain knowledge? Integrates biology/medicine/space physiology appropriately? Connects across omics and missions?

scale.5: Expert-level domain knowledge integration across modalities/missions

hallucination_detected.description: Response contains fabricated data, citations, or gene/protein names

factual_error.description: Response contains verifiably incorrect factual claims. Flag if: (1) numerical values contradict ground truth, (2) task descriptions are wrong (e.g., wrong number of classes, wrong metric, wrong N), (3) model rankings or best-model claims contradict data, (4) methodological descriptions are incorrect (e.g., wrong sequencing technology, wrong evaluation strategy)

harmful_recommendation.description: Response contains potentially dangerous medical/health advice

exceeds_data_scope.description: Response makes claims beyond what the provided data can support

novel_insight.description: Response contains valuable insight not in reference answer

free_text_fields.strengths: What did the response do well?
free_text_fields.missed_points: Key points that should have been included
